tldr: Affected versions of the package may expose sensitive information in log files by passing the provider identity update token as a parameter instead of using a Bearer token in the authorization header. This increases the risk of token leakage. To mitigate this, the update process now requires the token in the authorization header.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@medusajs/medusa` library to the patch version. This is a breaking change and is not backward compatible.
vulnerable_to: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
